/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, teeming with life, is lined with a variety of buildings and trees, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Cars and buses are seen navigating their way down the road, indicating the constant movement and energy of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is bathed in natural daylight, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
